job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>To help Trust scale our products and our team, we need an engineer that wants to step into a central role in our company. We are looking for an engineer whose work will focus on our core API but will involve projects up and down our stack.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Work with product owners to define functional and non-functional requirements</li><li>Design software architecture and systems to meet specified requirements</li><li>Work closely with technical and non-technical team members</li><li>Produce documentation for software and systems</li><li>Maintain and improve the software as needed</li><li>Assist in building a team of software developers (assist with hiring, mentorship, etc.)</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years of software development experience.</li><li>Expertise with object-oriented programming languages. Particularly Python.</li><li>Expertise with relational databases. Particularly PostgreSQL</li><li>Experience with API frameworks (e.g. Flask, FastAPI, Ruby on Rails).</li><li>Proven ability to design, build, and document APIs</li><li>Strong technical communication skills</li><li>Results-focused, collaborative, and pragmatic</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice-to-have Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>FinTech / Finance experience</li><li>Familiarity / Expertise with FastAPI framework</li><li>Familiarity with Ops platforms tools and processes (AWS, GCS, etc.)</li><li>Data pipeline experience</li><li>Familiarity with Docker</li></ul><p><br></p>
